item.description: Bos. Mill. and Friends are planning to attend the in the water Boston Boat Show Oct. 1-3. We are looking forward to meeting the staff of Boston Yacht and viewing there exhibition. If you are interested in attending the Boat Show with us please RSVP the number of guests. Can't wait to see all the newest models and styles of luxury watercraft.
item.name: Boston Millionaires are going to the "Boston Boat Show" Oct. 1-3
